name: Slendy Mungus
description:
Slendy Mungus! Play a short, cool, Multiplayer, funny horror experience with friends, or by yourself.

**YES, THIS GAME IS PURPOSELY HORRIBLE. IT IS SUPPOSED TO BE BAD AND LOOK BAD. THAT IS THE POINT OF IT**

The game is obviously inspired by the big hit off, Among Us, and yes, I know the jokes died a while ago. Just trying to get something out there. 

Play as familiar and funny characters! Choose nametags! Collect sprite cranberries!

**MULTIPLAYER**

to create a room so other people can join, click the "Create Room" button after choosing a name for it. 

to join another players room, just enter the same name they named their room, and click "Join Room".

You can also just play solo by pressing create room. (new solo feature coming soon).

Slendy Mungus! This game is still in it's very, VERY early pre-beta alpha stage. So if the game tends to be glitchy or if you are experiencing any problems, please tell me in the comments! 

More Updates Coming Soon!!!
